quote: Bachelors have consciences, married men have wives.
Bachelors have consciences, married men have wives.
Gamesters and highwaymen are generally very good to their whores, but they are very devils to their wives.
Husbands are chiefly good as lovers when they are betraying their wives.
Husbands are chiefly good lovers when they are betraying their wives.
I am thinking of taking a fifth wife. Why not? Solomon had a thousand wives and he is a synonym for wisdom.
I do not think that there are any men who are faithful to their wives.
If presidents don't do it to their wives, they do it to the country.
One good husband is worth two good wives, for the scarcer things are, the more they are valued.

One good husband is worth two good wives, for the scarcer things are, the more they are valued.
Wives are people who feel they don't dance enough.
Wives are young men's mistresses; companions for middle age, and old men's nurses.
You talk no more of that gay nation now,
